title: Council Decision of 7 July 1997 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 7 July 1997 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work (97/C 220/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 145 thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 74/325/EEC of 27 June 1974 on the setting up of an Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work (1),
Having regard to the list of candidates submitted to the Council by each of the Governments of the Member States,
Wheras by its Decision of 4 March 1994 (2) the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work for the period from 4 March 1994 to 3 March 1997;
Whereas the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work should be appointed for a period of three years,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Safety, Hygiene and Health Protection at Work for the period from 7 July 1997 to 6 July 2000:
I. GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
(a)
>TABLE>
(b)
>TABLE>
II. TRADE UNION REPRESENTATIVES
(a)
>TABLE>
(b)
>TABLE>
III. EMPLOYERS' REPRESENTATIVES
(a)
>TABLE>
(b)
>TABLE>
This Decision shall be published, for information, in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
The Italian members shall be approinted by a subsequent Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 July 1997.
For the Council
The President
J.-C. JUNCKER
(1) OJ No L 185, 9. 7. 1974, p. 15.
(2) OJ No C 85, 22. 3. 1994, p. 1.
